name: Monsters Defense
description:
It's a dark day. Monsters are falling from the sky. All people live in fear. We are men.
We are reliable and love this city. We must protect who we love, protect our city.
We must make a defense. Don't let them harm any people.

How to play:
When monsters fall, time will slow a little bit. You must shoot them down.
Click left mouse or use finger on mobile to shoot.
